site.description: Fluorite Event Logger plug-in for Eclipse logs the user(developer)'s behavior while they are editing code. The log file is automatically written when the Eclipse is shut down. The logged files can be found at ".metadata/.plugins/edu.cmu.scs.fluorite/Logs" under the current Eclipse Workspace. This plugin is developed based on the "Practically Macro" plugin for Eclipse, which is a macro recording plugin for Eclipse text editor (http://practicalmacro.sourceforge.net/).
